Class TowerDefenseModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • TowerDefenseModel

  • public class TowerDefenseModel
extends java.util.Observable
    Model Class for tower defense game
    Author:
    Sean Doolen, Patricia Lemmen Meyer

      Constructor for model that takes in an observer and a level number.

      • placeTower

        public boolean placeTower(Tower tower,
                          int row,
                          int col)
        Allows towers to be place on the board If a tower is placed then currency is subtracted by the tower's cost
        Parameters:
        tower: - the specific tower to be placed
        row: - the row where the tower's placed
        col: - the column where the tower is placed
        Returns:
        true if the tower was placed, false otherwise

      • sellTower

        public boolean sellTower(int row,
                         int col)
        Allows towers to be sold for half their cost
        Parameters:
        row: - the row of the tower sold
        col: - the column of the tower sold
        Returns:
        true if a tower was sold, false otherwise
